mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wine_products (name, price, purchase_price, product_number, gift, product_type, first_month_amount, second_month_amount, create_dept, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{purchasePrice}, #{productNumber}, #{gift}, #{productType}, #{firstMonthAmount}, #{secondMonthAmount}, #{createDept}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})
